ValidationRule.description: Block users from manually creating Repeat Purchase cases. RO-1761
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "RepeatPurchaseCase", ISNEW(), NOT(Created_by_Automation__c), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Customer Operations Manager", $Profile.Name <> "Head of Customer Operations", NOT( AND( $Profile.Name = "Enterprise Account Manager", OR( Account.Account_ID_18_digit__c = $Label.AccountId_DB , Account.Account_ID_18_digit__c = $Label.AccountId_Deutsche_Post_AG, Account.Account_ID_18_digit__c = $Label.AccountId_REWE_Handel_Deutschland, Account.Account_ID_18_digit__c = $Label.AccountId, Account.Account_ID_18_digit__c = $Label.AccountId_SchenkerDeutschlandAG, Account.Account_ID_18_digit__c = $Label.AccountId_Deutsche_Post_AG_NonREACH, Account.Account_ID_18_digit__c = $Label.AccountId_Deutsche_Post_And_DHL_REACH
) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case can never be created manually, but automatically by closing a second purchase or account management opportunity.
